successes.title: pixelstick - Light painting evolved.
successes.description: Add photoreal images, abstract designs, and animation to your long exposure photos and timelapse.

Pledges.description: DON'T FORGET TO WRITE: A set of 3 4x6 postcard prints - see bottom left for details on the images. Use it to send to your loved ones when you elaborately fake your death, D.B. Cooper style.
POSTER BOY: 18x24 poster print - see picture to the left for details on the print. Dorm room wall not included.
FIRST CRACK: Congratulations! Like most early birds, you get the worm. You'll get one of the first  Pixelsticks off the line, for less!
BELOVED BACKER: Pixelstick will arrive at your doorstep, shiny and new and ready to rock, as soon as it's ready. This will be ahead of any retail launch and for a lower price as well!

THE GIFTABLE ONE: This reward level is for people who want to get pixelstick as a gift for someone else and needs proof. When the campaign ends, we'll send you a full-color, double sided postcard in a snazzy envelope that'll be appropriate for the gift-giving occasion of your choice. Later, in May, we'll ship pixelstick wherever you like.

NYC SHOOTENANNY: Along with your pixelstick, participate in a group shoot with Steve & Duncan as well as a few other interested backers. We'll meet in Manhattan or Brooklyn and show you some of the tips and tricks we've picked up for getting the most out of your new toy. Post-shoot drinks (the) weather and (your) mood permitting. Bring your Pixelstick! This reward is limited to backers in the NYC area, or backers who can get themselves to the NYC area.
SHOOTENANNY II: THE REVENGE. By popular demand, we've added a second (and final) group shoot for anyone who wants to get out there in the NYC area and get shootin'.
